import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import styles from '../../assets/cssModules/contact.module.css' import FormContext from '../../context/FormContext' const ContactForm = () => { const { handleChange, handleSubmit, values, errors } = useContext(FormContext); return (
{errors.name && {errors.name}}
{errors.email && {errors.email}}
{errors.phone && {errors.phone}}
{errors.company && {errors.company}}
